thread.title: Immigration Plan Comes Up at Canada Summit… Trump Shuts Down Debate with 1 Line
thread.title_full: Immigration Plan Comes Up at Canada Summit… Trump Shuts Down Debate with 1 Line

author: Davis
title: Immigration Plan Comes Up at Canada Summit… Trump Shuts Down Debate with 1 Line
text:
HIGH NOON: White House Issues 6-Word Threat to Iran Straight Out of Cowboy Western 
“ I’m just doing what I said I would do when we won by a very, very large Electoral College vote — and I knew that was going to happen,” Trump stated. 
You can really tell how different Trump is from other politicians. Americans aren’t used to elected officials keeping their word, so when Trump actually keeps his word, it’s a shock to everyone. 
“I knew this is what people were wanting and that wasn’t the only reason. That wasn’t my only thing that we did so well on. But that was something that was very important,” Trump continued.   
Trump stated that the administration was taking “very hardened criminals” and “getting them out.” He also stated that many people were “very happy” with what he was doing so far. 
For his part, Trudeau side-stepped the issue of Canada’s opposition to Trump’s immigration ban by stating that he wasn’t going to lecture Trump on how to run his own country. 
“The last thing Canadians expect is for me to come down and lecture another country on how they choose to govern,” he stated flatly. 
You can watch the full news conference below (the immigration question comes about the 14 minute mark):
